unnormalised: **Traffic Alert: Don't Get Stuck in a Diwali Dhamaka!**
normalised: **Traffic Alert: Don't Get Stuck in a Diwali Dhamaka!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, just a heads-up on the traffic front! With Diwali just around the corner, the Bengaluru Traffic Police are cracking down on violations. Expect extra checkpoints, especially near market areas like KR Market and in residential zones.
normalised: Hey folks, just a heads-up on the traffic front! With Diwali just around the corner, the Bengaluru Traffic Police are cracking down on violations. Expect extra checkpoints, especially near market areas like K R Market and in residential zones.

unnormalised: Remember that helmet rule, even if you're just nipping out for some biryani fix. And those speed limits – stick to them! They've deployed extra patrols on the Outer Ring Road (ORR) and near Hosur Road.
normalised: Remember that helmet rule, even if you're just nipping out for some biryani fix. And those speed limits – stick to them! They've deployed extra patrols on the Outer Ring Road (O R R) and near Hosur Road.

unnormalised: New rules are being enforced regarding lane discipline too. No more sudden lane changes, especially on flyovers! The fine for that could set you back Rs. 500.
normalised: New rules are being enforced regarding lane discipline too. No more sudden lane changes, especially on flyovers! The fine for that could set you back rupees five hundred.

unnormalised: Plus, they're clamping down on overloaded vehicles. Apparently, someone was spotted trying to transport a whole Onam Sadhya feast on a scooter! (Don't do that!).
normalised: Plus, they're clamping down on overloaded vehicles. Apparently, someone was spotted trying to transport a whole Onam Sadhya feast on a scooter! (Don't do that!).

unnormalised: The authorities are also implementing stricter parking regulations within a 2 km radius of major temples to ease congestion.
normalised: The authorities are also implementing stricter parking regulations within a two kilometer radius of major temples to ease congestion.

unnormalised: So, plan your trips, factor in extra travel time, and drive safe! No one wants a traffic ticket ruining their festive mood. Drive like a pro, not a 'chai pe charcha' star driver. Happy Diwali!
normalised: So, plan your trips, factor in extra travel time, and drive safe! No one wants a traffic ticket ruining their festive mood. Drive like a pro, not a 'chai pe charcha' star driver. Happy Diwali!
